column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: air pollution. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix ap: <http://example.org/air_pollution/> .ap:AirPollution a owl:Class ;    rdfs:comment "Air pollution is the presence of substances in the air that are harmful to the health of humans and other living beings, or cause damage to the climate or to materials" .ap:CauseOfAirPollution a owl:Class ;    rdfs:comment "Factors which trigger air pollution" .ap:EffectOfAirPollution a owl:Class ;    rdfs:comment "Impacts felt due to the presence of air pollution" .ap:hasCause a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ap:AirPollution ;    rdfs:range ap:CauseOfAirPollution ;    rdfs:comment "Link between air pollution and its cause(s)" .ap:hasEffect a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ap:AirPollution ;    rdfs:range ap:EffectOfAirPollution ;    rdfs:comment "Link between air pollution and its effect(s)" .ap:Emission a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ap:CauseOfAirPollution ;    rdfs:comment "The release of pollutants into the air from a source" .    ap:VehicularPollution a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ap:Emission ;    rdfs:comment "Pollution emitted by vehicles due to burning of fuel" .ap:ParticleMatter a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ap:AirPollution ;    rdfs:comment "Tiny particles or droplets in the air that are two and one half microns or less in width, a major component of air pollution" .ap:PM10 a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ap:ParticleMatter ;    rdfs:comment "Particulate matter of size less than or equal to 10 micrometers" .    ap:PM2_5 a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ap:ParticleMatter ;    rdfs:comment "Particulate matter of size less than or equal to 2.5 micrometers" .ap:HealthImpact a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ap:EffectOfAirPollution ;    rdfs:comment "Health related impacts of air pollution" .ap:RespiratoryIssues a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ap:HealthImpact ;    rdfs:comment "Issues related to the respiratory system caused by air pollution" .ap:ClimateChange a owl:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ap:EffectOfAirPollution ;    rdfs:comment "Changes in climate patterns primarily due to excessive air pollution" .```
